_header: O ye virtuous sovereign spirtual and temporal
Title(s): Life of St. Thomas of Canterbury
Subjects: Thomas of Canterbury, saint, life of; saints’ lives
_description: Laurence Wade, Life of St. Thomas of Canterbury — rhyme royal stanzas

CamCCC298.First Lines:
O ye virtuous souerayne spirituall and temporallAnd all þe
                    deuoute people both more and lesse…
CamCCC298.Attributed Title:

                        Laurentio Wade claustrali commonacho ecclesie cristi Cantuariensis (f.
                    2)
